item.description:
An Animal Totem is an important symbolic object used by a person to get in touch with specific qualities found within an animal which the person needs, connects with, or feels a deep affinity toward.Each animal has its own special power and message, for each animal has a powerful spirit and an inherent skill.  Animal Spirits choose a person to be a companion to, a friend to, not the other way around. Do you have a Totem Animal or Spirit Animal? Join us for this very interesting topic.

Suggested Donation $1.00
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the table with the Meetup sign
item.name: "Totem Animals" Do you have one? How do you find one?
